Literature.Title: Functional characterisation and modification of a novel Kunitzin peptide for use as an anti-trypsin antimicrobial peptide against drug-resistant Escherichia coli
Literature.Author: Wang Z, Ding W, Shi D, Chen X, Ma C, Jiang Y, Wang T, Chen T, Shaw C, Wang L, Zhou M

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human keratinocytes HaCat:IC50=44.69 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:IC50=133.2 µM,Horse erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=>128 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MBC=4µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis NCTC 11047(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis NCTC 11047(MBC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MIC=32µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MBC=8µM),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12697(MIC=>128µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=4µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=2µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=16µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MBC=8µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MIC=8µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MBC=8µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-747(MIC=>128µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(IC50=25.46µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 1720(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 51625(MIC=>128µM),Escherichia coli NCTC 13846(MIC=4µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 2342(MIC=16µM)
